column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I went into my bathroom and started to run the bath , letting the water get warm enough .
#text=Once warm , I plugged up the drain and the bath began to fill .
#text=I dripped some bubble bath into the water to get it nice and bubbly .
#text=Suds filled the tub along with warm water , creating a heavenly scent .
#text=Once the tub was filled , I disrobed and got in .
#text=I sat for a moment , relaxing , allowing the warm water to sooth my skin .
#text=After a few moments , I grabbed a bar of soap and lathered my body .
#text=I washed myself carefully because I did not want to spill water onto the floor .
#text=I washed my hair and dunked my head under water to clear the shampoo and conditioner .
#text=After awhile the water began to cool .
#text=Since I was done washing , I unplugged the drain and let the water drain out .
#text=I grabbed a towel and dried off .
